mapper.select: SELECT count(DISTINCT bg.TagID) count,left(bg.FlightNo,2) countType, DATE_FORMAT(bg.FlightDate,'%Y-%m') time from baggage bg WHERE bg.FlightDate BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y') AND now() AND bg.IsDeleted != 1 GROUP BY countType,time

SELECT count(DISTINCT bg.TagID) count,bg.SourceID countType,left(bg.FlightNo,2) company, DATE_FORMAT(bg.FlightDate,'%Y-%m') time from baggage bg WHERE bg.FlightDate BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y') AND now() AND bg.IsDeleted != 1 GROUP BY countType,time,company

SELECT count(DISTINCT bg.TagID) count,al.Type countType,left(bg.FlightNo,2) company, DATE_FORMAT(bg.FlightDate,'%Y-%m') time from baggage bg INNER JOIN airline al ON bg.FlightNo = al.`No` WHERE bg.FlightDate BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y') AND now() AND bg.IsDeleted != 1 GROUP BY countType,time,company

SELECT count(DISTINCT bg.TagID) count,bg.SpecialBaggageType countType,left(bg.FlightNo,2) company, DATE_FORMAT(bg.FlightDate,'%Y-%m') time from baggage bg WHERE bg.FlightDate BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y') AND now() AND bg.IsDeleted != 1 GROUP BY countType,time,company

SELECT count(DISTINCT bt.TagID) count, bt.BaggageTraceConfigID countType, DATE_FORMAT(bt.OperateTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') time FROM baggagetrace bt WHERE bt.BaggageTraceConfigID IN (SELECT ID from baggagetraceconfig btc where btc.NodeName = '安检') AND bt.OperateTime BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y') AND now() GROUP BY countType,time
SELECT temp.airport FROM( SELECT count(DISTINCT bg.TagID) count,bg.SourceAirport airport from baggage bg GROUP BY airport ) temp ORDER BY temp.count desc LIMIT 5

select.if: SELECT count(DISTINCT bg.TagID) count ,left(bg.FlightNo,2) countType, DATE_FORMAT(bg.FlightDate,'%Y') time from baggage bg WHERE bg.SourceID != 'L' and bg.IsDeleted != 1 GROUP BY countType,time

SELECT count(DISTINCT bg.TagID) count ,left(bg.FlightNo,2) countType, DATE_FORMAT(bg.FlightDate,'%Y-%m') time from baggage bg WHERE bg.SourceID != 'L' and bg.FlightDate BETWEEN #{time} AND now() AND bg.IsDeleted != 1 GROUP BY countType,time
SELECT count(DISTINCT bg.TagID) count ,left(bg.FlightNo,2) countType, DATE_FORMAT(bg.FlightDate,'%Y') time from baggage bg WHERE bg.SourceID = 'L' and bg.IsDeleted != 1 GROUP BY countType,time

SELECT count(DISTINCT bg.TagID) count ,left(bg.FlightNo,2) countType, DATE_FORMAT(bg.FlightDate,'%Y-%m') time from baggage bg WHERE bg.SourceID = 'L' and bg.FlightDate BETWEEN #{time} AND now() AND bg.IsDeleted != 1 GROUP BY countType,time

mapper.select: SELECT temp.company FROM( SELECT count(DISTINCT bg.TagID) count,left(bg.FlightNo,2) company from baggage bg GROUP BY company ) temp ORDER BY temp.count desc LIMIT 5
